original: vande śrī vajrasattvaṃ bhuvanavaraguruṃ sarvabuddhaṃ bhavantaṃ
analyzed: vande śrī vajrasattvam bhuvana vara gurum sarva buddham bhavantam
nānā rūpam jinendram timira bhaya haram nirmitam meru śāntam
dharma ādhāram munīnām jina guṇa śubha dam maṇḍalam vajra dhātum
sarva ānanda eka rūpam parama sukha mayam dehinām mokṣa hetum
ajñāna gāḍha timira arṇava magna sattva
jñānam prakāśya paripūrita vīrya dhyānam
śrī vajra sattvam asamam śirasā namāmi
yasmin sura asura sura indra narendra vṛndā
s tvad pāda padma patitāḥ bhramarāḥ śirobhiḥ
śrī lokanātha caraṇam śaraṇam prayāmi
buddham trailokya nātham sura vara namitam pāra saṃsāra tīrṇam
dhīram gāmbhīryavantam sakala guṇa nidhim dharmarāja abhiṣiktam
tṛṣṇā moha andhakāram kali kaluṣa haram kāma lobha ādavantam

original: taṃ vande śākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamitaśirasā sarvakālaṃ namāmi || 4 ||
analyzed: tam vande śākyasiṃham praṇamita śirasā sarvakālam namāmi
hrīṃkāra saṃbhavam nātham karuṇā snigdha mānasam
amoghapāśa nāmānam lokanātham namāmi aham
māmakī locanā tārā padminī jina dhātave
sarva buddha ālayam caityam dharmadhātum namāmi tam
namastāre ture vīre tuttāre bhaya nāśini
ture sarva āture kāle svāhākāram namāmi aham  /
samantabhadra śāstāram śākyasiṃham namāmi aham
śrī vajrasattva stotram samāptam
